column4: Definition: The natural state of rest in which the body is inactive. The eyes are closed and consciousness is temporarily suspended.
column5: Example Sentence: It's bedtime. sweetie. Time to close your eyes and sleep. Introducing the word sleep" to babies helps them understand the concept of rest and bedtime routines. Associating the word with the act of closing their eyes and resting can aid in establishing healthy sleep habits from an early age."
